Deploy.Notes: Lists the required configuration keys that must be overwritten (by the GitHub configuration action) when we deploy this host
Deploy.Instructions: Whenever you add new settings to the top part of this file, consider adding them to the list below if you need them overwritten for deployment

Required.Description: Settings for specific optional technology adapters
Required.Instructions: If you configure any of these technology adapters to be the default at runtime, via dependency injection, then move those Keys to the previous section
